headline: Air Products and Chemicals (APD) Valuation Check After Q1 Beat NASA Hydrogen Deal And Dividend Increase
summary: Air Products and Chemicals (APD) is back in focus after reporting first quarter results that came in ahead of analyst expectations, announcing a new US$140 million NASA contract and extending its 44 year dividend increase streak. See our latest analysis for Air Products and Chemicals. The strong first quarter beat, new US$140 million NASA hydrogen contract and 44th consecutive dividend increase have coincided with a 1 month share price return of 10.32% and a 3 month share price return of...
